overview:
Yoram Greener, Chief Product Officer Salorix

With over 15 years of experience working with Fortune 500 companies across retail, automotive, consumer electronics, CPG and travel & entertainment, Yoram has identified analytically driven marketing opportunities and develop and implemented highly customized solutions across marketing, service and technology. Yoram has been providing consulting services to advertising agencies in social, digital and CRM. Prior he has worked as Head of Analytics for Big Fuel social media agency, a Publics leading social media agency, Senior Director Strategy at Merkle and as a Managing Director Analytical Solutions for MBS Insights. Yoram Greener is Adjunct Instructor at NYU. He holds BA degrees in Economics and Statistics, and an MBA from Hofstra University.
